text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: 『Hilly port, the slop and the sea, merged with the cats, creating this fascinating historical landscape』――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Slope and sea… It's a perfect place for training camp to do slope training and swimming!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Hmm, but I might get distracted by the cats in the middle of the training and lose my focus…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: No! This is rather 『Even a pot can be a dumbbell depending on how you use the pot』!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: It could help me on my mental training by not getting distracted by the cats…! This place is suitable for training camp after all…!
